Package com.filehandler

Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
com.filehandler.CHRooted
com.filehandler.FileStats
com.filehandler.FileHandler
public class FileHandler extends FileStats
FileHandler: Add/Remove/Edit files from storage. This API can get file list, read metadata, read, create, edit and remove files and directories. Use FileStats if no direct operation of file is to be done.
See Also:

    • FileHandler

      public FileHandler(String CHRoot)
      Create new 'FileHandler' instance with 'CHRoot' as restricted directory.
      Parameters:
      CHRoot - Restricted directory to call API. No API call for file outside this directory can be made.

      Creates new file at filePath.
      Parameters:

    • write

      Writes to the file at filePath.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path of file, where data is to be written related to 'files'.
      buffer - The data to be written to file.
      append - To append to file, or overwrite the file.
      Returns:
      'true', if data is written successfully. 'false', otherwise.

      public byte[] readFile(String filePath)
      Reads the file at filePath.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path of file to be read, relative to 'files'.
      Returns:
